Utility Functions for HLA Table ELT

Source: R/dm_hla.R
UtilsHLA.Rd

Collection of utility functions for HLA data

Methods

Public methods

  • UtilsHLA$std_hla_tbl()

  • UtilsHLA$std_hla_allele()

Method std_hla_tbl()

Usage

UtilsHLA$std_hla_tbl(tbl, na = c("", "NT", "Blank", "-", "Not Interpretable"))

Arguments

tbl

[tbl_dbi] A table containing HLA data

na

[chr] Vector of values to interpret as NA

Returns

[tbl_dbi] The standardized table Standardize HLA Allele Representations

Method std_hla_allele()

Usage

UtilsHLA$std_hla_allele(x)

Arguments

x

[chr] A vector of allele IDs

Returns

[chr] Standardized alleles
